plot: A popular man in the king's court during the Shilla Dynasty, Won Sul enjoys the friendship of the king and princess. However, when he returns from a lost battle in defeat, he is disowned by his family
title: Won Sul-rang
plot_es: A popular man in the king's court during the Shilla Dynasty, Won Sul enjoys the friendship of the king and princess. However, when he returns from a lost battle in defeat, he is disowned by his family
plot_en: A popular man in the king's court during the Shilla Dynasty, Won Sul enjoys the friendship of the king and princess. However, when he returns from a lost battle in defeat, he is disowned by his family
